column5: and then this guy just deserves it lol  http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=OODv5XQbskY&NR=1
lol, yup... sometimes people are just askin for trouble!
That was wild!  The second guy is a bit of an idiot, but the first guy was just in the wrong place at the wrong time.  What are the chances?  Good vids.  Thanks.
These video's show up from time to time here.  What is wild about the first video is that while he is reviving the smaller fish, another larger pike comes and slams it.  Look closely.
HAHA the second guy is such an idiot...
i wonder what hurts more?  The actually bite or the fact that his buddy has it on film and its now on you tube haha  Cheers!
